description:
Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.
Une application pour commander en quelque clics.

Discover authentic street foods from around the world with Flavor Road. This comprehensive app helps you explore, track, and learn about traditional street foods through an interactive map, detailed encyclopedia, and personal food passport.
Navigate through a beautiful map interface to find street food locations across different countries and cities. Each food entry includes rich details like ingredients, flavors, cultural history, vendor stories, and dining etiquette. Filter foods by category, dietary preferences, or occasion to find exactly what you're looking for.
Build your culinary passport by marking foods as tried and adding favorites to your collection. Track your food journey with detailed statistics showing your exploration progress across different countries and food categories. Unlock achievements as you discover new foods and expand your culinary horizons.
Perfect for food enthusiasts, travelers, and anyone curious about global street food culture. Whether you're planning a trip or simply want to learn about different cuisines, Flavor Road brings the world's street food scene to your fingertips.

***** Die offizielle McDonald’s Deutschland App *****
Smart bestellen und genießen

Mit der McDonald‘s App hast du die ganze Welt von McDonald‘s Deutschland jederzeit, smart und einfach in deiner Hand. Alle Produkte, alle Services, alle Aktionen, alle Coupons. Einfach herunterladen, registrieren und nichts mehr verpassen!

Deine Vorteile auf einen Blick:

+ Mit exklusiven Coupons clever sparen
+ Bequem digital in über 1.000 Restaurants bestellen
+ Mobil bezahlen und keine Wartezeit an der Kasse mehr
+ Alle Produkte und Infos in einer App
+ Lieblingsessen als Favoriten speichern
+ Keine Specials und Gewinnspiele mehr verpassen

Das alles wartet auf dich:

GENUSS ZUM SCHNÄPPCHENPREIS
Ob Burger-Enthusiast oder Fritten-Fan - mit der McDonald's App verpasst du keine Coupons, Gutscheine und Angebote mehr! Einfach kostenlos anmelden und die Coupons im Restaurant oder direkt über die App einlösen.*

NIE MEHR SCHLANGE STEHEN
Vom Klassiker bis hin zu deinem persönlich kreierten Lieblings-Burger - deine Wunschbestellung kannst du ganz einfach über die McDonald's App zusammenstellen und in einem Restaurant deiner Wahl abholen oder direkt dort genießen. Die Bezahlung erfolgt bequem per App oder bar bei Abholung. Schlange stehen war gestern!**

KEINE AKTION MEHR VERPASSEN
Entdecke regelmäßig leckere Neuheiten und spannende Kampagnen in der McDonald's App. Zusätzlich warten zahlreiche Gewinnspiele und großartige Preise auf dich! Lass dich überraschen!*

ALLE RESTAURANTS & SERVICES
Die McDonald's App zeigt dir alle McDonald's Restaurants und Services in deiner Nähe. Zusätzlich hast du alle Details und Informationen zu deinen Lieblingsprodukten wie Preise, Nährwerte und Inhaltsstoffe immer zur Hand.

TREUE WIRD BELOHNT - MIT DEM SAMMELPASS
Sammelspass mit Sammelpass! Mit der McDonald's App hast du deinen Sammelpass immer griffbereit. Hol dir einen Stempel beim Kauf eines Heißgetränks in der Größe Regular oder Grande und genieße jedes 7. Getränk gratis.***

*****

Jetzt downloaden, exklusive Coupons schnappen und smart bestellen!

Guten APPetit



*Nur für registrierte Nutzer. In allen teilnehmenden Restaurants.
**Nur für registrierte Nutzer in ausgewählten Restaurants.
***Das Gratis Getränk gilt für ein Heißgetränk in der Größe Regular. Nur für registrierte Nutzer. In allen teilnehmenden Restaurants.

Tired from a long day at work or just want to treat yourself? 
You've come to the right place! On our application, we offer you all types of cuisine from the best restaurants in Luxembourg at your doorstep in the blink of an eye!

Fancy a good burger, pizza, sushi, or anything else? Just enter your address, choose the restaurant and finalize your order! We will deliver it with a fast and quality service!

Our customers are our highest priority, so you can always interact with us for any advice or if you need help. We are always at your disposal!

We don't just deliver great food, we deliver happiness!

My Burger King? That’s the application of Burger King Belgium & Luxembourg.

With My Burger King in your pocket, you have all advantages of Burger King with you, all the time!

Advantages, you say?
- For every purchase, you’ll receive our BK Coins. These BK Coins allow you to buy Burger King products.
- New product? New Burger King restaurant? Be the first to be updated on our latest news.
- Hungry? Find the Burger King restaurant closest to you in Belgium & Luxembourg
- And possibly you can score a coupon or two…

Download My Burger King, register and receive your first BK Coins already.

The Official Thermomix® Cookidoo® App gives you access to the growing universe of mouth-watering Thermomix® Guided Cooking recipes. You pick and choose which recipes go with you wherever you are. Create an account and get cooking!


SMART @ HEART
Connect to Cookidoo® and access over 100,000 worldwide recipes directly from your app and through the screen of the Thermomix® TM6. Also, be sure to check out the exclusive step-by-step photos and videos, making cooking easier than ever.


YOUR THERMOMIX® COOKIDOO® ACCOUNT
To use the app, you need to have your Thermomix® Cookidoo® username and password. Your local Thermomix® Cookidoo® website will tell you how to create your account for the app.


GET INSPIRED
Wondering what to cook today? Discover hundreds of ideas for every taste, season and occasion! With Cookidoo® membership, you get instant access to every recipe on Cookidoo®. Everything’s on the menu! Our recipe suggestions and articles will point you in the right direction.
 
 
CREATED RECIPES
Discover our newest Cookidoo® feature! You can create, import and modify your favourite recipes, save them all in one place and cook them with your Thermomix®. Your Thermomix®, your way.


PLAN AND COOK
Planning is easy and fun, add recipes to your planner and find the recipes ready for cooking when you need them. The Cook Today button on each recipe lets you schedule a recipe with a single click.


MAKE IT YOUR OWN
Create your own recipe lists to manage your recipes the way you want. Bookmark any recipe you find appealing so you can find it later. You can also view recipes you scheduled in the past.
 
 
COOK-KEY® BRINGS GUIDED COOKING TO YOUR FINGER TIPS
Cook-Key® connects your Thermomix® TM5 to Cookidoo®. Enjoy sending your recipe favourites, weekly plan and recipe collections from the iOS App to your Thermomix®.


Terms of Use:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

MiamMiam est une société Luxembourgeoise de service en ligne qui vous permet de commander des repas pour la livraison ou à emporter auprès des restaurants, par l’entremise de notre site ou application mobile. Utiliser les services de MiamMiam ne coûte absolument rien et il n’y a pas de frais cachés.

Le prix que vous payez est le même que celui que vous payeriez en communiquant directement avec le restaurant. Notre service est sécuritaire et tellement facile à utiliser que vous ne commanderez plus jamais par téléphone.

Pour commander en quelques clics :

• Indiquez votre code postal
• Choisissez votre restaurant préféré
• Faîtes votre commande
• Le resto vous livre

Tout simplement! Bon APPétit!t!!

L'application est régulièrement mise à jour et améliorée. Vous avez des conseils, des idées ou tout autre suggestion pour notre application? Alors envoyez-nous un e-mail via info@miammiam.lu

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

Have an idea to make your cooking experience with ReciMe better? Please email us at hello@recime.app so we can help!

//The most downloaded wine cellar management app in 2025!
Oeni helps you manage your wine cellar/collection and recommend the best wine at the best time (peak). Whether you're a seasoned collector or a casual wine lover, Oeni offers comprehensive tools to easily manage your wine inventory.

//Master your inventory at your fingertips
Oeni tracks the history of your cellar, its stock, and aging with precision and simplicity.

- Discover our immersive 3D wine cellar feature to easily visualize and organize your bottles, as if you were there!
- Scan and add your bottles quickly: With a directory of more than 400,000 bottles, including majestic wines, adding your wines to the Oeni cellar only takes a few seconds. Our application has similar performance to other well-known wine apps such as Vivino, VinoCell, Invintory, wine-searcher or CellarTracker.
- Specify their vintage: By adding the vintage of your bottles, Oeni will be able to recommend the ideal time to open them.
- Enter their purchase price: The purchase price of your bottles is a crucial element for tracking your expenses and investments over time.
- Monitor your stock: Oeni allows you to know your stock accurately and will help you manage it over time. Your cellar will no longer have any secrets for you.
- Analyze their aging: Follow the aging phases of each of your bottles to know their maturity level and peak date.
- Enjoy with the right dish: Oeni recommends food and wine pairings with over 5,000 dishes so you don't miss any tasting.
- Analyze Aging: Follow the aging phases of your wines to determine their maturity and peak dates. Oeni’s vino wine scanner feature helps you understand the aging process better.

//Track the financial value of your cellar
Oeni analyzes the price of each bottle and follows its evolution over time.

- Measure your expenses: Analyze your expenses month by month, year by year, to understand and adapt your budget.
- Know the value of your cellar: Every month, Oeni retrieves the market price of your bottles to continuously update the value of your cellar.
- Track your capital gains: Oeni informs you of your real-time capital gains and bottle by bottle, so you don't miss anything.
- Expense Analysis: Monitor your expenses month by month and year by year to better understand and manage your budget.
- Value Tracking: Oeni updates the market price of your bottles monthly, providing an accurate valuation of your cellar. Our wine reviews cellar feature keeps you informed about the current market trends.
- Capital Gains Monitoring: Stay informed about your real-time capital gains on each bottle to optimize your collection.

//A personal and intelligent sommelier
Oeni manages your wine cellar and recommends the right wine at the right time.

- Food and Wine Pairings: Choose from over 5,400 food and wine pairings to find the perfect pairing for any meal. Oeni will make recommendations as relevant, or even more relevant, than other apps like Vivino, cellartracker or Wine Scanner to provide you with the best recommendations.
- Refine your search by specifying the occasion: "an everyday wine," "a nice dinner with friends," or "for special occasions."
- Oeni will then analyze your wine cellar to find the perfect match based on food and wine pairings, the aging phases of your bottles, and their market value.
- Oeni offers its selection of bottles with a recommendation percentage for each of them. All you have to do is choose.

Additional Features :
- Extensive Wine Database: Access a database of over 400,000 bottles and 2,400 appellations.
- Detailed Wine Information: Get complete details on each bottle, including wine reviews and ratings
- Best cellar management tool for wine collection

More information on the terms of use and the privacy policy
- Privacy policy: https://oeni.app/en/politique-de-confidentialite/
- Terms of use: https://oeni.app/en/conditions-generales-dutilisation/

EggRow Keeper is a charming fridge inventory app with a unique twist — everything is designed around the metaphor of eggs in a refrigerator. The interface looks like a cozy fridge, and each product is visualized as an item in a nest, with eggs taking center stage. It helps users track food items, monitor expiration dates, estimate the total value of their fridge, and manage a shopping list — all wrapped in a light-hearted, visually engaging experience.

The main screen displays your virtual fridge with organized shelves. You can add products manually, specifying name, category, quantity, purchase date, and expiration. Categories include dairy, vegetables, meat, eggs, and others — each placed on its own "shelf." Eggs are treated as a special product type, displayed in a dedicated egg tray. When an item expires, it’s marked with a distinct “rotten egg” icon for quick recognition. You can also view a filtered list of soon-to-expire or missing items.

EggRow Keeper includes a simple analysis tool. When adding items, you can enter their price (per unit, kilogram, liter, etc.). The app then calculates the total "value" of your fridge contents. A category breakdown shows where most of your spending goes (e.g., "Dairy — 38%"). It also keeps track of patterns — how often you buy eggs, which items run out the fastest, and more.

The integrated shopping list helps with restocking. Items that are out of stock are suggested for the list automatically, but you can add or remove anything manually. Once an item is marked “purchased,” it can be moved directly into your fridge. You can also sort the list by category, making trips to the store more efficient.

A unique feature of the app is the “Egg of the Day” — a daily card offering a fun fact, quote, or practical food storage tip. The cards come in various humorous moods like “The Philosopher Egg” or “The Proud Egg.” You can save these cards to your gallery or share them with friends on social media.

Additional settings include expiration reminders, currency and unit preferences, data reset, and access to the privacy policy and developer info. EggRow Keeper offers a practical yet playful approach to home food organization — especially for egg lovers.

TheFork is Europe’s leading restaurant booking platform, proudly bringing people together through unique and affordable culinary experiences since 2007. What are you waiting for? Activate your location and we’ll activate your taste buds! You set the tone, we set the table.

TheFork continues to be savoured across the biggest foodie hotspots in France, Spain, Italy, the UK, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Portugal, Denmark, and Sweden. But wait, what exactly do we bring to the table? Here are 6 reasons to download TheFork app right now.

1. Things that tickle our taste buds: fast, free and easy online booking
We know that normal life means having a lot on your plate, so to make things a bit easier for you, we've simplified restaurant booking. With a few simple taps on our mobile app, you’ll be one step closer to having that ‘mmm’ moment of pure belly satisfaction, in the most seamless way possible.

2. Frugal on prices, never on flavours
Our amazing restaurant partners love their diners as much as we love ours and offer exclusive discounts on reservations throughout the year (automatically applied and subject to conditions at the time of booking). That way restaurants get to open their doors to all types of diners, making dining out accessible to everyone.

3. Community insights = better bites
Tuck into the wisdom of our gourmet community! With over 20 million trusted reviews from only customers who have actually tried the restaurant—your palette is in good hands!

4. We don’t skimp on choice
Reserved? Not us. That’s just a label for a table. So whether you’re looking for the perfect spot for bottomless brunching, taco crunching or al-fresco munching, our foodies are spoiled for choice with our diverse collection of over 60,000 restaurants and 40,000 photos, menus and community reviews that will satisfy just about any culinary mood and occasion. After all, variety is the spice of life! Browse, scroll and add to favourites, so you can find more of what you love. Now that’s food for thought.

5. We take loyalty VERY seriously
To reward our awesome foodie community, every booking with TheFork accumulates unique Yums points, which can be redeemed in the form of a tasty discount at one of our many partner restaurants down the line. Here’s how it works:

1 reservation = 100 Yums (Y)

Once you've accumulated enough you can enjoy amazing offers which converts to: 
1000 Yums = £20 loyalty discount!
2000 Yums = £50 loyalty discount!

Keep an eye out for Double Yums and other ways to earn more Yums as you book.

We love hearing from our TheFork foodie community! Reach out at contact@thefork.com.

>In the UK, follow us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheFork.uk/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thefork_uk/?hl=en

Unlock your home's full potential with HomeID.


HomeID, formerly NutriU, is your all-in-one app for meal planning and prep, with a variety of healthy and delicious recipes to explore. It's your companion for delicious Airfryer recipes and meals - from breakfast to dinner, healthy snacks, and delightful coffee breaks. Collaborating with home cooks, professional chefs, baristas, and Philips Kitchen Appliances, HomeID elevates daily routines into enjoyable experiences with:
• A vast array of easy recipes for every meal and occasion, including snacks, main courses, desserts, brunches, hot drinks, and more. Explore a world of homemade culinary delights.
• Detailed nutritional information for each recipe, empowering you to make informed choices for yourself and your loved ones.
• Diverse culinary options catering to all preferences, such as pasta, casseroles, chicken dishes, cheesecakes, and an extensive selection of vegan and vegetarian choices.
• Instructional videos, expert advice, and integrated features for Philips kitchen appliances, covering Airfryers, coffee/espresso machines, pasta makers, blenders, juicers, Air Steam Cookers, and All-in-One Cookers.
• Tips for crafting the perfect espresso or a simple caramel latte, bringing barista-level coffee into your home.
• A community dedicated to finding joy in the small things amid busy schedules.
• Plus, you can now purchase home appliances directly from your HomeID app.


HomeID - Your Comprehensive Home Appliance App.
Maximize your capabilities with HomeID. Suitable for new appliance owners and seasoned users, HomeID unveils the full potential of your home.
Embrace simplicity in your daily life. Join us at HomeID.

Experience the world of Nespresso on your iPhone or iPad.

The Nespresso app allows you to buy coffee capsules, machines and accessories on-the-go or at home on your iOS device.
Enjoy the Nespresso shopping experience anytime, anywhere:
•	Refill your stock of capsules and explore new coffees
•	Find the right machine for you, and exclusive accessories to complete your coffee corner at home
•	Stay up to date with the latest Nespresso Limited Edition coffees
•	Discover the nearest Nespresso points of interest on the store locator (Nespresso Boutiques, retail stores selling Nespresso coffee machines, and coffee capsule recycling points)
Do even more with the app with one of our ‘connected’ machines:
•	Get notified when your capsule stock is running low to ensure you never run out 
•	Navigate through recipes to nurture your inner barista
•	Ensure the best coffee experience cup after cup through regular notifications from your machine on when descaling is needed, or the water tank is nearly empty
•	Get direct access to machine “How-to” videos

Take advantage of our extensive delivery services*, such as:
•	Free Standard or Pick Up Point delivery on purchases of coffee capsules and machines
•	Nespresso Boutique Pick-Up
•	Nespresso Express delivery 
•	Nespresso Saturday & Sunday delivery
•	Nespresso Your Time (choose the most convenient date and time of your delivery)
*Availability and conditions of each service depend on your geographical area

Sammeln, sparen & bestellen ganz einfach mit deiner REWE App.
Ob Euros sammeln und einlösen mit unserem Vorteilsprogramm REWE Bonus, noch mehr sparen mit aktuellen Angeboten in deinem Markt, Treupunkte sammeln, mit einem Scan sicher zahlen, deinen digitalen Kassenbon erhalten oder köstliche Rezeptideen entdecken: Mit deiner REWE App hast du alle deine Vorteile immer griffbereit – und kannst sogar bequem beim REWE Liefer- oder Abholservice bestellen.

Hol dir jetzt die REWE App und sichere dir alle Vorteile!

► Mit REWE Bonus Euros sammeln, einlösen und sparen
► Alle Supermarkt-Angebote in deinem REWE Markt immer im Blick
► Einkauf einfach mit der Einkaufsliste planen
► Treuepunkte sammeln und Prämien sichern
► Sicher zahlen mit REWE Pay
► Deinen Kassenbon mit dem REWE eBon digital erhalten
► Alle Vorteile einfach mit einem Scan beim Einkauf nutzen
► Bequem Lebensmittel online bestellen oder liefern lassen
► Über 7.000 Rezepte zum Nachkochen entdecken


REWE Bonus: Sammle Euros in der REWE App!
REWE Bonus ist das neue Vorteilsprogramm in deiner REWE App, das deinen Einkauf individuell belohnt: mit Bonus-Guthaben in Euros. Einfach sammeln, nach deinem Geschmack einlösen und sparen!

Aktuelle Prospekte und Angebote
Mit unseren wöchentlich wechselnden Angeboten und Prospekten kannst du beim Einkaufen noch mehr Geld sparen. Entdecke eine große Auswahl an Angeboten für Produkte wie frisches Obst und Gemüse, Fleisch- und Wurstwaren, Käse, Desserts, Milchprodukte, Tiefkühlprodukte und vieles mehr – perfekt für den Wocheneinkauf oder ein Picknick. Aktiviere Push-Notifications, damit du keinen Rabatt verpasst!

Einkaufsliste erstellen
Vergiss deinen Einkaufszettel auf Papier! Erstelle ab jetzt lieber ganz bequem eine digitale Einkaufsliste mit deiner REWE App und geh noch entspannter einkaufen. Du kannst die Einkaufsliste natürlich auch per Spracheingabe erstellen.

Deine Prämien mit digitalen Treuepunkten
Einfach praktisch: Mit der REWE App kannst du unsere Treuepunkte jetzt digital sammeln und einlösen. So hast du dein Sammelheft immer dabei und findest alle Infos zu aktuellen Aktionen mit einem Klick.

Mit einem Scan sicher zahlen
Spare Zeit und zahle bequem mit REWE Pay! Scanne hierfür nach Aktivierung deine REWE App an der Kasse und deine Zahlung wird automatisch abgewickelt. (Nur in teilnehmenden Märkten.)

Dein digitaler Kassenbon
Verzichte mit dem REWE eBon auf Papier! Scanne beim Einkauf in deinem REWE Markt an der Kasse deine REWE App und schon ist dein digitaler Kassenzettel in der App unter "Meine Einkäufe" verfügbar – auch per E-Mail! Bequem, umweltfreundlich und immer griffbereit

Alle Vorteile mit nur einem Scan
Einfacher geht’s nicht: Sammle alle deine REWE Bonus Vorteile sowie deine Treuepunkte mit nur einem Scan ein! Aktiviere dazu einfach alle Vorteile, die du nutzen möchtest in deiner REWE App und profitiere vielfach mit jedem Scan an der Kasse.

Lebensmittel online bestellen
Bestelle frische Lebensmittel online beim REWE Lieferservice oder REWE Abholservice. Entscheide selbst, ob du dir deine Lieferung bequem nach Hause liefern lassen oder zum gewünschten Zeitpunkt im Supermarkt abholen möchtest. Egal ob frisches Obst und Gemüse, Getränke oder Tiefkühlprodukte: Unser Lieferservice bringt dein Essen mit gekühlten Lieferwagen und so kommen deine Lebensmittel stets frisch bei dir an.


Folge uns auf Social Media für die aktuellsten Angebote:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/REWE
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rewe/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/REWE_supermarkt

Feedback oder Vorschläge? Schick uns eine E-Mail an: mobile@rewe.de

With 65 million users, Vivino is the world’s largest wine app and marketplace empowering people everywhere to enjoy wine to the fullest. Vivino provides wine drinkers access to unbiased information about wine from a community of millions. 

HOW IT WORKS
• Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine 
• Instantly see a wine’s rating, reviews, price, tasting notes, and suggested food pairings 
• Get your favorite bottles delivered to your door
• Add your ratings and reviews 
• Easily keep track of wines you like and discover new recommendations 
• Save the bottles you buy in your cellar, so you always know what you have on hand 
• Buy the right wine every time! 

VIVINO PREMIUM
Level up your wine game with...
• Our full scanning suite, including rapid-fire scanning so you can compare countless bottles within seconds
• Exact “match for you” scores for every single wine
• By-the-bottle insights into whether you usually like, loathe, or have never explored a wine style, grape, region
• Wine adventures to taste and play your way through Italy, Bordeaux, and beyond

STATS AT A GLANCE 
• 65 million app downloads and climbing 
• 16 million wines and counting from 245,000+ wineries 
• Millions of unbiased ratings and reviews 
• Hundreds of thousands of wines available for purchase in 18 markets worldwide  

KEY FEATURES
• Unbiased Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
• Wine Buying Made Easy: Conveniently buy wine directly from the Vivino app. 
• Personalized Recommendations: Discover more wines you will love through Vivino’s wine recommendation engine that only suggests wines we know you will love based on your unique scanning, rating, and purchase behaviour, and community ratings. 
• Quick Compare: Pick the best wine on the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels in seconds to instantly view ratings, region, price, and food pairings all on one page. 
• Wine List Scanner: Select the right wine every time from any restaurant’s entire wine list. 
• Taste Characteristics: Know what the wine you’re eyeing tastes like before buying it. Taste Characteristics aggregates the most commonly used words to describe wines.
• Taste Profile: Track and organize your wines to determine your taste profile, discover new wines, and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

Privacy policy: https://www.vivino.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.vivino.com/terms

Please note that we are not able to reply to comments or questions left in App Store reviews. If you have any support-related inquiries or need assistance, please contact support@vivino.com

With the Takeaway.com app, you can order whatever you love, wherever you are. With a wide variety of restaurants, supermarkets and convenience stores to choose from, you can enjoy everything from burgers, pizza, pasta, sushi, salads and loads more, and get it all delivered to your door.

Need some bits from the supermarket? Just open the app, choose ‘groceries’ and fill your basket. Whether it’s baby food, flowers, beer, wine, beauty products, ice cream, chocolate, milk, fruit and bread, our partners have it all.

How it works:
Ordering is easy. You can either pick a saved address, fill in your postcode/street name or let the app find your location automatically. You can then choose your favourite restaurant or store and select whatever you fancy. 

Follow your order to your doorstep:
Track your order from the kitchen or store straight to your doorstep with our Food Tracker®. We'll even send you push notifications to update you about the status of your order. It usually takes 30-45 minutes to deliver your food or groceries.

What you get with our app:
- Quick and hassle-free ordering
- Great offers and discounts
- Choose to pick up your order at the restaurant or store
- Re-order the same delicious meal with one tap of a button
- Browse grocery stores, cuisines, offers, best-rated restaurants, nearby spots and vegetarian/halal options
- Get regular updates on your order with our handy Food Tracker®
- Choose from multiple payment options

Order from big brands or local heroes. 
Takeaway.com has it all!

developer: Globus SB-Warenhaus Holding GmbH & Co. KG
description:

Alle Vorteile auf einen Blick:


- Digitale Kundenkarte, Übersicht über PAYBACK Punkte und Mein Globus-Tankrabatt

- Digitaler Kassenzettel

- Scan & Go mit dem Smartphone nutzen und ohne langes Anstehen bezahlen

Fragen oder Ideen?

Viel Spaß mit der Mein Globus App!

... et commander des accessoires pour vos robots et blenders : Cookeo, Companion, Blenders, Turbo Cuisine, Easy Fry, Cook'in One, Kitchen Machines...


FACILITEZ-VOUS LA VIE EN CUISINE : Trouvez des recettes selon vos besoins en 2 clics (légumes frais de saison, cuisine du monde, recettes prêtes en moins de 30 min…). Reprenez votre historique des dernières recherches consultées, utilisez les filtres pour gagner du temps ou déclarer les ingrédients que vous ne voulez pas voir apparaître dans vos recettes.


PLANIFIEZ VOS REPAS : Vous pouvez planifier facilement vos menus pour la semaine à venir et vous assurer de manger des aliments sains et délicieux. 
Une fois les ingrédients dans votre liste de courses, c'est parti pour le shopping! Vous êtes sur la voie d'une vie plus sereine en un rien de temps.


ORGANISEZ-VOUS À VOTRE MANIÈRE : Rassemblez facilement toutes vos recettes favorites dans l’onglet « Mon Univers » de votre application My Moulinex. Vous avez la possibilité de modifier ces carnets de recettes comme bon vous semble.


DES RECETTES UNIQUES : Ajoutez une touche personnelle à vos plats préférés Cookeo et Companion ! Modifiez une recette en y ajoutant ou supprimant des ingrédients. Vous avez la possibilité d'enregistrer la nouvelle recette pour vous permettre de la retrouver plus facilement.


DÉCOUVREZ UNE IDÉE RECETTE PAR JOUR : Trouvez l'inspiration avec nos suggestions du jour. Projetez-vous dans la réalisation d'une recette avec votre robot multicuiseur intelligent.


UNE COMMUNAUTÉ ACTIVE : Créez vos propres recettes et rendez les accessibles à toute la communauté. Commentez et notez les recettes pour échanger vos astuces. 
Et parce que cuisiner rime avec partager, avec l'application My Moulinex vous pouvez envoyer vos recettes préférées à vos proches !


VIDEZ VOTRE FRIGO ET ÉVITEZ LE GASPILLAGE : Grâce à la fonctionnalité « dans mon frigo », recherchez des recettes de cuisine en fonction de vos goûts et des ingrédients dont vous disposez dans votre réfrigérateur. Votre application vos proposera une sélection de recettes adaptées réalisables avec votre robot cuiseur.


L'application My Moulinex est votre véritable compagnon de cuisine qui vous accompagne au quotidien. Les recettes « pas-à-pas » vous aident à réaliser vos entrées, plats, desserts préférés en fonction de vos goûts, des ingrédients disponibles et du nombre de portions que vous souhaitez. Pour chaque recette vous trouverez un descriptif détaillé des ingrédients et du temps de cuisson de ces derniers.


L'application My Moulinex vous offre aussi la possibilité d’acheter les accessoires nécessaires pour votre robot multicuiseur intelligent et ainsi réussir votre recette.

Retrouvez l'ensemble de ces fonctionnalités et tous vos produits Turbo cuisine, PerfectMix, Robot pâtissier, Steam’up, Companion, Cookeo, Cocotte-Minute, Easyfry dans une seule et même application.

** Apple’s App of the Day in 120+ Countries **  

** Used by 2M+ Chefs Worldwide **  

"Unlimited amount of inspiration" — Netflix Superstar Ana Roš


Gronda is the #1 app for professional and home chefs. Learn from the world’s best, fine dining recipes, and connect with a global community of culinary experts. Discover inspiration, sharpen your skills, and build your personal brand as a chef.

Explore an extensive library of 50,000+ recipes from top chefs, 60+ masterclasses from industry legends, and exclusive content from chefs at starred restaurants. Use cutting-edge tools like the AI Recipe Creator to craft unique dishes, and join a community of over 2M chefs.

Subscribe to PRO to access premium content and support the chefs who inspire you. Whether you're an aspiring home chef or a seasoned professional, Gronda is your gateway to the culinary world.

GRONDA FEATURES

RECIPES FROM STARRED CHEFS 
* Find 50,000+ recipes chefs actually cook in their restaurants.  
* Exclusive content from 1,500+ chefs at starred restaurants.  
* Explore fine dining recipes and discover new inspiration for your dishes.

MASTERCLASSES FROM INDUSTRY LEGENDS
* 60+ classes from world-renowned chefs, including:  
  - Ana Roš (***), Alex Atala (**), Pascal Barbot (***), and Jan Hartwig (***).  
  - Chefs featured on the 50 Best list, including the Best Restaurant of 2024.  
* Learn techniques and tips that transform your cooking.  

ALL TOPICS COVERED
* Techniques (Sous-vide, Fermentation, Gelification, Dehydrating, Emulsifying, Freezing, Spehrification, Baking, Drying, Pressure Cooking, and many more)
* Pastry  
* Plating techniques  
* Seasonal ingredient selection  
* Flavor balancing  
* Sauce creation (Hollandaise, Béchamel, emulsifications)  
* Dessert techniques (e.g., tempering chocolate, macarons)  
* Protein preparation  
* Knife skills  

COMMUNITY OF CHEFS
* Join 2M+ chefs worldwide, from home cooks to culinary professionals.  
* Connect, share, and grow together in the only platform for real chefs.  
* Follow chefs and restaurants you love.

AI RECIPE CREATOR
* Use the power of AI to craft new variations of recipes.  
* Get creative and elevate your culinary skills.

BUILD YOUR BRAND  
* Share your recipes and creations with the community.  
* Create menus and collections with your favorite recipes. 
* Gain followers to build your reputation.  

ALSO FEATURING
* Daily inspiration from hundreds of famous chef creators.  
* Content available in English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese.  

Gronda is your ultimate culinary companion, no matter your skill level. By subscribing to PRO, you support the chefs who create the recipes and classes that inspire you.

Subscription pricing and terms:

Gronda offers an auto-renewing subscription to PRO, unlocking access to premium content and tools while supporting the chefs. Payment is charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase. Manage your subscription in your Account Settings.

Data protection: https://gronda.com/legal/privacy
Terms of use: https://gronda.com/legal/conditions-user
